question: Which organisation conducted a survey titled “'Youth and Covid-19: impacts on jobs, education, rights and mental well-being”?
explanation:
The International Labour Organisation (ILO) undertook a survey titled 'Youth and Covid-19: impacts on jobs, education, rights and mental well-being'.
As per the survey, almost half of the world's youth population is undergoing anxiety or depression-causing situations. More than a third are not sure of their future career prospects due to the Covid-19 pandemic. The survey was conducted to study the effect of pandemic on the lives of youths aged 18 to 29 years.
